meanings.definition: A telephone that has the capability of transmitting images as well as sound.
meanings.sent1: My grandma showed me a picture of her garden on the picturephone.
meanings.sent2: I called my friend on the picturephone and we could see each other's faces.
meanings.sent3: The picturephone made it easy for us to share vacation photos with our family.
meanings.sent4: The picturephone turned our long-distance conversations into colorful moments.
meanings.sent5: Using the picturephone, I felt like I was right there with my friend.

meanings.sent1: Let's picturephone each other to discuss the project details.

meanings.sent3: I picturephoned my friend to show her the new puppy.
meanings.sent4: He picturephoned his parents to share the good news.
meanings.sent5: Picturephoning makes it feel like we're in the same room.

meanings.definition: The act of using a picturephone to make a call.
meanings.sent1: The picturephone call with my sister was so clear and fun.
meanings.sent2: We had a picturephone chat with our cousins overseas.
meanings.sent3: The picturephone call with grandma always brings a smile to my face.

meanings.sent5: The picturephone call made our hearts feel closer despite the distance.
